metadata.name: Piran, Slovenia
metadata.description:
Piran is a picturesque medieval coastal town in Slovenia. My studio is nearby, so I'm a frequent visitor. 

Even though it's buzzing with tourists in the summer, it always feels calm in a way. Some locals like to say that time stops in Piran. And I've tried to capture that feeling in the animated loop.

The hills in the back are a hint at the majestic Alps, which are visible on clear days from Piran's shores.

And the sound of the violin is a nod to Piran's renowned composer and violinist Giuseppe Tartini.
